examples: My friends enjoyed tangy barbecue gammon skewers at the summer barbecue.
The children enjoyed a refreshing slice of watermelon on a hot summer day.
My friends enjoyed smoky beef rib chops at the countryside barbecue.
My vegetarian friend enjoyed a nourishing adzuki bean grain bowl for lunch.
The hiker enjoyed the scenic beauty of the river's gentle bends.
words.defineEn: to take pleasure or find happiness in something or someone
words.defineVi: để có niềm vui hoặc tìm thấy hạnh phúc trong một cái gì đó hoặc ai đó

examples: She gave a reading from her latest volume of poetry.
She spent the afternoon reading and was happy as a clam.

The parent instilled in their children the importance of reading and education, knowing that if your books are not read, your descendants will be ignorant, and they wanted their children to have a better chance in life.
A student who skims through a reading assignment and misses important details may struggle to understand the material and end up having to read it again.

The book club members discussed how they choose the books they read, agreeing that choosing your author as you choose your friends was important - reading was not just an intellectual exercise, but also a personal and emotional one.
words.defineEn: the act or process of looking at a written or printed piece and comprehending its meaning
words.defineVi: hành động hoặc quá trình nhìn vào một tác phẩm được viết hoặc in và hiểu ý nghĩa của nó

examples: Most millipedes curl up into a ball.
Curling up with a good book?
It's all curled up.
LINDA MASTROMONACO, Serene and Simple Life: I curl up.
Then it curls up and waits.
words.defineEn: to position one's body like a ball with one's arms and legs placed close to one's body while sitting or lying
words.defineVi: đặt cơ thể của một người giống như một quả bóng với cánh tay và chân của một người đặt gần cơ thể của một người khi ngồi hoặc nằm

examples: This book bridges a gulf between the metaphysics literature and philosophy of mind literature.
The book raises many important questions.
Every age has its book, after all.
The movie follows the book faithfully.
The movie follows the book faithfully.
words.defineEn: a set of printed pages that are held together in a cover so that we can turn them and read them
words.defineVi: một tập hợp các trang in được giữ lại với nhau trong một trang bìa để chúng ta có thể lật chúng và đọc chúng

examples: Joe was doing sums aloud.
To laugh loudly/aloud/heartily.
That can read aloud.
The story doesn't look good for things like speed of reasoning and perception, pattern recognition, and short term memory for words said aloud.
And then to me, aloud, 'Come here, child.'
words.defineEn: with a volume that a person or animal's voice can be heard clearly
words.defineVi: với âm lượng mà giọng nói của một người hoặc động vật có thể nghe rõ

examples: listen to our problems.
Listen Jane.
I listened carefully to her story.
Don’t listen to Jerry.
Don't listen to him.
words.defineEn: to give our attention to the sound a person or thing is making
words.defineVi: để cung cấp cho sự chú ý của chúng tôi đến âm thanh một người hoặc điều đang làm

examples: Getting rid of noise enhances the quality of your audio and makes it sound more pleasing to the ears.
Records, cassettes, CDs, or streamed audio files.
That audio was courtesy of the pool.
The phone will record the screen without audio.
The external processor doesn't even get audio feedback.
words.defineEn: the sound or audible content in the form of music, speech, or other types of sound that can be recorded, played, or transmitted
words.defineVi: âm thanh hoặc nội dung nghe được dưới dạng nhạc, lời nói hoặc các loại âm thanh khác có thể được ghi, phát hoặc truyền đi

examples: Does this pub do lunches?
Does this pub do lunches?
Does the price include tax?
Microprocessors do the calculations in the twinkling of an eye.
The gang did a warehouse and a supermarket.
words.defineEn: to perform an action or activity that is not mentioned by name
words.defineVi: để thực hiện một hành động hoặc hoạt động không được đề cập theo tên

examples: He placed the puzzle pieces back into the puzzle box.
He placed the puzzle pieces back into the puzzle box.
Sometimes he spoke straight from the shoulder and sometimes in puzzles
He scratched his head, puzzled by the difficult math problem.
She had a fast mind and could quickly solve puzzles.
words.defineEn: a game that needs a lot of thinking in order to be finished or done
words.defineVi: một trò chơi cần rất nhiều suy nghĩ để hoàn thành hoặc thực hiện

examples: Generally, the article reads very well.
Your article barely laid a glove on my arguments.
The journalist published a wrong statement in the article.
The magazine has an article about famous celebrities and their lifestyles.
The articles in this magazine are a cut above the others.
words.defineEn: a piece of writing about a particular subject on a website, in a newspaper, magazine, or other publication
words.defineVi: một bài viết về một chủ đề cụ thể trên một trang web, trên một tờ báo, tạp chí hoặc ấn phẩm khác

examples: The online retailer had an edge over the other services with its faster shipping and wider selection of products.
She left a positive review online for the restaurant where she ordered a pizza.
Many companies saw the advent of online retailing as a threat to their bricks and mortar business.
He searched online for reviews of the product before making a purchase.
Can you recommend any online resources for studying world history?
words.defineEn: connected to or via the Internet
words.defineVi: kết nối với hoặc thông qua Internet

examples: I could skim that pool.
But we’ve only just skimmed the surface!
And then you skim that off, and then you run it through a colander and you've got straight seeds.
If it's real, I think it's skim probably.
As a followup, I’ll admit that I skimmed over some details in this derivation and it’s much easier to do with calculus.
words.defineEn: to lightly and quickly move over a surface
words.defineVi: để nhẹ nhàng và nhanh chóng di chuyển trên một bề mặt

examples: The newspaper has an entertainment section with movie reviews and celebrity news.
All newspapers sang from the same song sheet.
She reads the newspaper every day to keep up with the latest news.
I use the newspaper as a source for my research papers because it has reliable information.
The newspaper has a column where readers can write in and ask for advice.
words.defineEn: a printed publication or a set of large folded sheets of printed paper that contain news, articles, ads, etc., usually issued daily or weekly
words.defineVi: một ấn phẩm in hoặc một tập hợp các tờ giấy in lớn được gấp lại có chứa tin tức, bài báo, quảng cáo, v.v., thường được phát hành hàng ngày hoặc hàng tuần

examples: Hachette and Amazon set out to renegotiate their e-book contract.
Our e-books are a unique feature on the app, so make sure you check out Rivet and search for our channel name and read our books!
Through multiple partnerships to sell e-books and audiobooks.
For example, in one small study, participants who spent four hours reading e-books before bed for five nights, produced 55% less melatonin than participants that read print books.
What's more, the e-book readers reported that they were more alert before bed, took longer to fall asleep and reach restorative REM state, and were more tired the next morning.
words.defineEn: a book that is published or converted to a digital format
words.defineVi: một cuốn sách được xuất bản hoặc chuyển đổi sang định dạng kỹ thuật số

examples: The local factory produces electronic components.
The flight attendant scanned my electronic ticket before I boarded the plane.
It will take an electronics expert to dismantle it.
The tech company's latest product was the frontrunner in the race to develop the next big thing in consumer electronics, with innovative features and a sleek design.
Its entire government is electronic.
words.defineEn: (of a device) having very small parts such as chips and obtaining power from electricity
words.defineVi: (của một thiết bị) có các bộ phận rất nhỏ như chip và lấy năng lượng từ điện
